title: The Left’s Smear Campaign Has Begun | Guest: Bill O’Reilly | 1/8/21
description:
President Trump agrees to a peaceful transition to a Biden administration and denounces the Capitol rioters as one officer dies from injuries. The media’s hypocrisy compared to the summer’s riots is unbelievable. Pat gives his take on the Capitol chaos and Bitcoin’s insane rally. Bill O’Reilly gives his thoughts on the week, Trump’s concession, and how Stacey Abrams flipped Georgia. President Trump won’t attend Joe Biden’s inauguration. The Left’s attacks against conservative media have begun. BlazeTV’s Elijah Schaffer has been targeted by CNN and Rep. Eric Swalwell for documenting the Capitol riot. An emotional listener calls in about the challenging future ahead. A new Danish children’s show is causing outrage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
